conference_notes:
• Data anonymization is not enough to increase confidence on data processing (especially algorithms) and actors.
  • OPAL Project means a standardization for this.
  • Not only privacy issues are important, but also for companies, reputation and legal vacuums are important too and might affect the way of acting.
  • Finally, data and algorithms represent a new paradigm which will change the way we see data and it will affect decision-making.
name: The Open Algorithms (OPAL) Project: Unleashing the Power of Private Sector Data for Public Good
info: Open Algorithms Project helps processing information, but this also addresses some concerns on potential misuse of data or even privacy issues. How all this can be solved was shown in this session.

tweets.content: @andkamau: "Open algorithms driven by country needs; not just government needs" #iodc16 http://www.opal-project.de/

session.description: The open algorithms (OPAL) project: unleashing the power of private sector data for public good
